title: Toluca Lake Garden style apartment
posting_body: Toluca Lake Garden style apartment in a small four unit building.
Upper rear unit that has been totally remodeled.
Brand new kitchen with ceramic tile floors, shaker cabinets, stainless appliances, quartz countertops.
New bathroom with ceramic tile floors, shaker cabinets and large shower.
New double pane windows, split air conditioning & heat system.
All the amenities of new buildings with all the old world charm!
Shared laundry room, one garage space.
